query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Final Report on Design of multimodal hubs and network optimization
result.description: This report will update D3.1, including: the design multimodal hubs in the SCALE-UP urban areas considering the interaction of multiple transport modes; the Analysis and implementation of network optimisations. It will describe the final implementations in T3.2, T3.3 and T3.4.

result.title: Validation of strategies on the horizontal upscaling approach 1
result.description: This deliverable will present the framework for validation of the strategies for horizontal upscaling as well as the validation processes itself. This is the first version of the deliverable and it refers to task T1.3.

result.title: Final Report on Implementation of behavioural change with a focus on active and healthy modes solutions
result.description: This report will update D6.1, including: actions to gain insights into (travel) behaviour and user needs, to raise awareness, implementation of incentive mechanisms and nudging of travel behaviour. It will describe the final implementations in T6.2, T6.3 and T6.4.

result.title: Final Report on Implementation of data-driven strategies and tools
result.description: This report will update D4.1, including: the analysis and implementation of a data framework with new approaches for data capturing, advanced data analytics and business intelligence; regulatory framework translated into open data services. It will describe the final implementations in T4.2, T4.3 and T4.4.

result.title: SCALE-UP online Platform, Newsletter and social media activity 1
result.description: The SCALE-UP online platform (project website) will be implemented. It will include a dashboard providing graphical information about the current status of the project implementation. The e-newsletter template will also be designed as well as social media profiles.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as Digital transition).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

category.displayCode: /Arts (arts, history of arts, performing arts, music)

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: Annual Report 1
result.description: Annual Reports will be published and distributed to all our target audiences and beyond. They will highlight the efforts made by Nets4Dem in the foregoing year by describing latest research findings, innovations in democratic governance and successful transfer of these innovations into best practises for capacity-building on all levels of policy-making. The Annual Report of Nets4Dem will be the cutting-edge publication on democracy innovation in the EU and the associated countries for the years to come.

result.title: Guidelines and recommendations for other cities / urban areas on the SCALE-UP strategies for vertical and horizontal upscaling 1
result.description: This deliverable will present the first version of the the analysis and integration of outputs from WP1 tasks and the feedback from WP2WP7 in the form of guidelines and recommendations for the application of the framework for development implementation and validation of strategies for vertical and horizontal upscaling in other cities and urban areas This revision will include the aggregated approaches for vertical and horizontal upscaling This deliverable is an outcome of task T14

result.description: Conducting research process that will result in research hypotheses. Each partner will perform case analyses at their site and conduct a depth interview with industry partners. Results will be discussed during joint focus groups.Delivery months: 11, 23

project.title: New approach to innovative technologies in manufacturing

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as Digital transition).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis
